column4: Having a bit of trouble: ubuntu 9.10 cannot see any wifi adapters on my system; as it is a laptop with a wifi on/off switch, I know it exists~  Anyone run into this before, or know how to fix it?
What laptop, and give me the output of lspci in a pastebin
Poke around linuxwireless.org for your card, also check the Hardware Drivers app in Ubuntu
